titles.title: Expressing support for designation of September 12, 2009, as "National Childhood Cancer Awareness Day".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 6/23/2009--Introduced. Expresses support for the designation of National Childhood Cancer Awareness Day. Pledges to make the prevention and cure of cancer a public health priority. Urges public and private sector efforts to promote awareness, invest in research, and improve treatments for childhood cancer.
